home.title: Awesome OpenClaw Skills
home.subtitle: Discover and install skills for your AI assistant
home.intro: OpenClaw is a locally running AI assistant that can be extended with community‑built skills. Browse categories, search for skills, get recommendations and install safely.
categories.title: Categories
recommend.title: Get Recommendations
compare.title: Compare Skills
export.title: Export Skills
about.title: About this site
about.description: This website mirrors the Awesome OpenClaw Skills repository. It helps non‑coders discover, compare and install skills. Always review code and security scans before installing.
